loc2.description: The shantak claws at you as it swoops past overhead. Pass a Speed (-2) check or lose 2 Stamina as its claws rake your chest.
loc2.name: the dreamlands

other.description: You sleep, fitfully, and awaken to the sound of your own voice, chanting something. Make a Luck (-2) check. If you pass, you are able to retain what you are saying. Draw 1 Spell and gain 2 Clue tokens. If you fail, the chant attracts something unsavory. A monster appears!
